TopicTitle: A test concept for a landing deployment elevator for a large ship

Articles.Content: Little hard to get it to redock, but with refinement i think i can make a working elevator to deploy and pick up vehicles on surface of planets using this concept.

You need some KAS in your life

Awesome stock design though.
KAS is installed , but purposely just using stock parts to see if it can be done

KAS is installed , but purposely just using stock parts to see if it can be done

Looks promising. I'm not very creative so I usually end up visiting both moons and Duna, sometimes build a station then start over lol. UGH.
Nice, took some time before I figured out that the wheels lifted the elevator.
that's a cool idea! I wonder if you can make a smaller version using the little wheels, or does it require the grip and and power of the large wheels?
I made a similar eleveator.. My big problem was that the wheels/tires would often just pop.
